mapper.insert: insert into plan_review(user_id, plan_idx, review_content, review_rating) values (#{user_id}, #{plan_idx}, #{review_content}, #{review_rating}) SET @review_idx = LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: select p.review_idx, p.user_id, p.plan_idx, p.review_content , p.review_rating, p.create_date, i.img from plan_review p inner join review_img i on p.review_idx = i.review_idx where p.review_idx = #{review_idx}

select review_idx, user_id, plan_idx, review_content, review_img, review_rating, create_date, update_date from plan_review where user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') review_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1 and r_del_yn = 'y' order by review_idx desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(review_idx) from plan_review where user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') review_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1 and r_del_yn = 'y'
